title: Trump Rejects Iranian President’s Claim Over Sanctions Offer
text:
President Trump denied claims by his Iranian counterpart that the U.S. offered to lift all sanctions on Tehran during the United Nations General Assembly, as Washington and its allies pushed the Islamic Republic to negotiate a new, broader nuclear deal.

“They had explicitly said that they will remove all sanctions,” Iranian President Hassan Rouhani said upon his return to Tehran from New York on Friday, in remarks carried by state TV. But as the sanctions “live on,” he said Iran would be unwilling to negotiate with the U.S....
description: President Trump denied claims by his Iranian counterpart that the U.S. offered to lift all sanctions on Tehran, as Washington and its allies pushed the Islamic Republic to negotiate a new, broader nuclear deal.
